name: Lost Time (rakthalekk)
description:
Recommended downloadable version for best performance. Web version has some delayed sound effects.

Play as Benjamin Franklin and sort the items in your home! Order was never your strong suit, but that doesn't mean it's not worth trying to sort your belongings...

Drag and drop the items into the correct category within the time limit. You only have 30 seconds for each round, and the number of items to sort increases each round!

This game was created as a Term Project for my American Literature class.

Music credit: “Fantasia del Bello Alcazar” by sawsquarenoise is licensed under CC BY 4.0 from https://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise
